TopicTitle: Twitch Thursdays: RJLupin2 Goes a Little Crazy

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_n4x46aGrSJ1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=I%2Bgo%2Ba%2Blittle%2Bbit%2Binsane&channel=rjlupin2&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=4153145"></object></p>

<p>When all goes bad the first time - make it worse the second! That’s the mindset of RJLupin2, who’s unsuccessful first flight inspires him to do it bigger and better the next time - or something like that. Watch what happens when you build a craft while going mad.</p>

<p>Warning - NSFW language</p>
That was the best eight minutes Iv'e ever wasted watching a KSP video!

ITT: We watch a KSP streamer go insane. With a rocket with a face.

Anyway, hilarious. I'm still laughing.
